description_for_human: Mint Beeper NFTs, buy VOT/MAXX tokens, and access DeFi services on Base blockchain via x402 micropayments.
description_for_model: MCPVOT is an x402 Protocol ecosystem on Base blockchain. Use this plugin to mint Beeper NFTs ($0.25 USDC for 69,420 VOT + ERC-1155 NFT with VRF rarity), purchase VOT tokens ($1-100 amounts), purchase MAXX tokens with VOT bonus, and access burn statistics. All transactions use USDC on Base (chain ID 8453) via the x402 payment protocol.
